column4: im trying to apt-get libopenssl-ruby and getting this error "E: Invalid operation libopenssl-ruby"
anyone know what the prblem might be?
run this: sudo sed '/universe/s/^#//g' -i /etc/apt/sources.list && sudo apt-get update
do that command I gave you
just change your mirror: sudo sed 's|//us|//ca|g' -i /etc/apt/sources.list
it can't say the same thing
it is on your end then
